name: Classical Bomber
description:
Placing the bomb is the most popular and favorite game in the classical games. In the Classical Bomber game the player faces pitfalls, and dangerous enemies; In addition Player must avoid boom traps and kill enemies in each level. When fighting them, player can shoot them by using bombs to trap them. To play this game, the player uses the buttons in the board to control and place bombs. Players can bomb all over the place on the screen. Blow the enemies by clicking the bomb button on the right corner of the screen and wait for the bomb to explode. Note that underneath the bricks there are many useful items for us such as different bombs, faster character speed, more explosive power ...
If you are the last survivor then you will be the winner.
Please download and try classical bomber
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
